physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Nondysmorphic appearance, moderate subcostal retractions, shallow respirations, slightly diminished intensity of bronchial breath sounds, normal examination for gestational age.

Attempted to cry around endotracheal tube; decreased breath sounds bilaterally; heart sounds normal without murmurs; warm and well perfused extremities; ruddy, thin skin with visible veins; no plantar creases; no breast tissue; moved all extremities with resting posture in extension.
Development of neonatal abstinence syndrome characterized by tremors, agitation, poor sleeping, and frantic behavior.
Systolic ejection murmur appreciated; respiratory distress recurred; respiratory acidosis noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Trachea reintubated, and echocardiography showed normal structures but also revealed patent ductus arteriosus with left-to-right shunting.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Increased work of breathing; mottled skin; reintubated; developed hypotension and oxygen desaturation to 70%.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Deteriorated clinically with progressive multiorgan system failure leading to death.
